trans-unit.source: Amrou Scout
trans-unit.target: 安罗斥候

trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于3的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The people of Amrou were scattered by war and driven into hiding. Scouts maintain the beacon fires that signal "return" and "home."
trans-unit.target: 安罗人民离散四方以避战火。 斥候则看守分别代表了「避难」与「返乡」的信标火焰。

trans-unit.source: Amrou Seekers
trans-unit.target: 安罗追寻者

trans-unit.source: Amrou Seekers can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.
trans-unit.target: 安罗追寻者只能被神器和／或白色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: The paradise of Amrou Haven had become a field of cinders. Its people struggled to survive, hoping to see visions of its past in the strange storms that quickly passed.
trans-unit.target: 曾如仙境的安罗庇护地已化为遍野灰烬。 其间人民挣扎求生，希望能见到奇异风暴中惊鸿一瞥的过往美景。

trans-unit.source: Angel's Grace
trans-unit.target: 天使恩典

trans-unit.resname: TSP·3 | Angel's Grace | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't play spells or activated abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
trans-unit.target: 转瞬（只要此咒语在堆叠上，牌手便不能使用咒语或不是法术力异能的起动式异能。）

trans-unit.resname: TSP·3 | Angel's Grace | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You can't lose the game this turn and your opponents can't win the game this turn. Until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，你这盘游戏不会输，对手也不会赢。 直到回合结束，将使你的总生命减少至1以下的伤害，改为将它减少至1。

trans-unit.source: Benalish Cavalry
trans-unit.target: 宾纳里亚骑兵

trans-unit.source: "My people swore to protect Benalia to the end. It is battered, but yet stands, as do we."
trans-unit.target: 「我城人民誓死保卫宾纳里亚。 城墙虽已破旧，依然屹立不摇；吾人亦如是。」

trans-unit.resname: TSP·8 | Children of Korlis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We have a proud history of self-sacrifice. But it is easy, in these bleak times, to find one among us who is eager to die for any cause."\n—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis
trans-unit.target: 「我们拥有自我牺牲的光荣传统。 但在这凄凉年代，要找出愿意为任何理由舍身者，并不是太难。」 ～寇利斯侍僧塔瓦勒

trans-unit.source: Chronosavant

trans-unit.source: "In my dreams, I hear the voices of my future selves who have died in times yet to come. I use that knowledge to avoid those dark futures and continue my search for peace."
trans-unit.target: 「在我梦中，可以听见未来将死去的我之声音。 我藉此避开这黑暗未来，并且继续研究和平之途。」

trans-unit.source: What happens when it is the dream that wakes and the sleeper that fades into memory?

trans-unit.source: Moonlace

trans-unit.source: Once a vision of constancy in the sky, the moon had long been hidden from view by the haze that chokes the heavens. The very sight of it had become a sign that change was in the air.

trans-unit.resname: TSP·116 | Magus of the Mirror | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Behold! The image of the enemy and all that she has. Trust your envy, and take it."
trans-unit.target: 「看好了！ 这是敌人的样子，以及她拥有的东西。 依妒忌行事，全部接收下来吧。」

trans-unit.source: They traverse the mana-starved wastes in search of richer lands.

trans-unit.resname: TSP·203 | Magus of the Candelabra | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What would Urza think, I wonder, if he could hear how the nature mages still snarl at his name, but venerate the work of his apprentice?"\n—Teferi, to Jhoira
trans-unit.target: 「自然法师依旧对克撒嗤之以鼻，却崇敬其学徒之造物。克撒若能见到这景象，不知心中有何感想？」 ～泰菲力致尤依拉

trans-unit.resname: TSP·204 | Might of Old Krosa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes even humble forest creatures were gifted with mighty emanations from the past.
trans-unit.target: 有时就连卑微的树林生物都会蒙受过往放射之力。

trans-unit.target: 瀚力裂片妖

trans-unit.source: All Slivers get +2/+2.
trans-unit.target: 所有裂片妖得+2/+2。

trans-unit.source: "The colossal thing rumbled over the ridge, tree husks crumbling before it. The ones we were already fighting howled as it came, their muscles suddenly surging, and we knew it was time to flee."\n—Llanach, Skyshroud ranger
trans-unit.target: 「那庞然大物自山脊隆隆而过，树干应声而倒。 正与我们缠斗的家伙见状长嚎，身上隆起大块肌肉；我们知道该逃了。」 ～天帷护林兵拉纳可

trans-unit.source: "The forests have succumbed to ruin, but the spirit of Krosa remains alive and vital in these devouring spores."\n—Zyd, Kamahlite druid
trans-unit.target: 「树林已化为废墟，但这咨意吞噬的芽孢让克洛萨的精神依旧活灵活现。」 ～卡马尔宗德鲁伊季德

trans-unit.source: "Life gives way to death, and death to new life. Nature feeds upon her own decay."\n—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

trans-unit.resname: TSP·258 | Locket of Yesterdays | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Locket of Yesterdays
trans-unit.target: 昨日坠饰

trans-unit.resname: TSP·258 | Locket of Yesterdays | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Spells you play cost {1} less to play for each card with the same name as that spell in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 对你使用的咒语而言，你的坟墓场中每有一张与该咒语同名的牌，其费用便减少{1}来使用。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·258 | Locket of Yesterdays | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Every hour, at the turning of the glass, its owner had whispered to the locket, seeding it with secrets. This would be her legacy, her memory, if the rifts should take her.
trans-unit.target: 沙漏每翻转一回，其主人便向坠饰低语，将秘密埋藏其间。 若时缝将她带走，这将会是她的遗物与回忆。

trans-unit.source: Venser's Sliver
trans-unit.target: 凡瑟的裂片妖

trans-unit.source: Venser admired his handiwork and smiled. His first prototype had joined with the hive mind all too well, running with the brood and becoming a predator itself. This one, he thought, would be accepted into the hive but still obey his commands.
trans-unit.target: 凡瑟欣赏着自己的作品，满意地笑了。 他的首批原型作品早已混入母巢意识，分享同样的血脉，也顺利成为掠食者。 至于这一个，他认为将能为母巢接受，但依旧会服从自己的命令。
